A 'Crazy Wilbur' is a technique invented by the dwarvish Ticklebeard Clan. It involves getting your larger enemies to swallow your weapon, then calling it back to you - as messily as possible.

Returning Pike is one of the Pike Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Returning Pike is a magical weapon that returns to its user when thrown. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other feat
